author: COMSOL
description:
This app demonstrates the following:

• Choice of different user interface layouts for computer/tablet or smartphone
• Custom background image and color
• Graphics appearance with custom top color and bottom color
• Custom position of the graphics toolbar

The app computes diffraction efficiencies for the zeroth, first, and second diffraction orders, in transmission and reflection, as functions of the angle of incidence for a wire grating on a dielectric substrate. The app also shows the electric field norm plot for multiple grating periods for a selected angle of incidence.
label: plasmonic_wire_grating.mph
